thread.title: Great location and hotel
thread.title_full: Great location and hotel - Review of Hilton London Tower Bridge, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jennifer T
title: Great location and hotel
text: I enjoyed my stay at this hotel and the staff was super friendly. We got to the hotel at 730 am and they allowed us early entrance to the executive level and our room. I would definitely stay here again and I have recommended this hotel to family and friends. Convenient to tube and Tower Bridge.
